whereSoinsKarisma.text: WHERE ARE SOINS KARISMÄ PRODUCTS MANUFACTURED?

whereSoinsKarismaPara.text: Soins Karismä products are handmade at our state-of-the-art 40,000 square foot manufacturing facility in Montreal, Canada. Known for its welcoming side, Montreal is an inspiring and beautiful place to live.

howDoesSoinsKarisma.text: HOW DOES SOINS KARISMÄ DEVELOP ITS PRODUCTS?

howDoesSoinsKarismaPara1.text: Soins Karismä is constantly looking for quality ingredients, innovative and interesting product ideas. We take a collaborative approach and encourage each member of our team to share their ideas. We listen and rely on our partner salons, designers and customers to provide us with feedback. By understanding what our team and customers are looking for, we formulate products based on solutions that promote hair health

howDoesSoinsKarismaPara2.text: Our innovative research and development team formulates, tests and improves products before launching them on the market. We have the unique advantage of manufacturing ourselves internally with total control over the concept, the choice of ingredients, the formulation and the final product. Our formulations and manufacturing of our own products allow us to be agile and respond to changing market trends.

soinsKarismaBottles.text: ARE SOINS KARISMÄ BOTTLES RECYCLABLE AND FREE OF BPA?

soinsKarismaBottlesPara.text: Yes, Soins Karismä tubes and containers are BPA-free and recyclable.
